```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(crosstalk)
library(DT)
```

```{r}
earthquakedata <- read.csv("data/earthquakedata.csv")
```

# Statico {data-icon=fa-chalkboard}

## row

### 

```{r}
earthquakedata %>%
  filter(yr == 1995) %>%
  DT::datatable()
```

### 

```{r}
earthquakedata %>%
  filter(yr == 1995) %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon,
             lat = ~lat,
             label = ~yr)
```

# dinamico (crosstalk) {data-icon=fa-rocket}

```{r}
data_share <- SharedData$new(earthquakedata %>%
  filter(yr > 2000))
```
